shortdesc.ph: Retrieves the list of music resources for the specified chart by music chart ID.
Retrieves the list of music resources for a specified music chart by its ID.
Gets the list of music resources for the specified chart by chart ID.
Retrieves the list of music resources in a specified chart by chart ID.

p.codeblock: Future<String> getMusicCollectionByMusicChartId( {required int musicChartId, required int page, required int pageSize, String? jsonOption});
public abstract int GetMusicCollectionByMusicChartId(ref string requestId, int musicChartType, int page, int pageSize, string jsonOption = "");

section.p: After this method is successfully called, the SDK triggers the callback to report detailed information about the music resources in the chart.
After this method is successfully called, the SDK triggers the callback to report detailed information about the music resources in the chart.
After this method is successfully called, the SDK triggers the callback to report detailed information about the music resources in the chart.
After successfully calling this method, the SDK triggers the callback to report detailed information about the music resources in the chart.

plentry.pd: The ID of the music chart, which can be obtained via the callback. You can also use the RESTful API to [get the full song list of the music library](https://doc.shengwang.cn/doc/online-ktv/android/ktv-scenario/api/music-content-center#%E8%8E%B7%E5%8F%96%E6%9B%B2%E5%BA%93%E6%89%80%E6%9C%89%E6%AD%8C%E6%9B%B2%E5%88%97%E8%A1%A8) or [get the incremental song list](https://doc.shengwang.cn/doc/online-ktv/android/ktv-scenario/api/music-content-center#%E8%8E%B7%E5%8F%96%E5%A2%9E%E9%87%8F%E6%AD%8C%E6%9B%B2%E5%88%97%E8%A1%A8).
The current page number, starting from 1 by default.
The total number of pages in the current music resource list. The maximum value is 50.

Extended JSON field, defaults to null. You can use this field to filter the music resources you need. Currently supports filtering music resources that can be scored and chorus segments:
pitchType: Whether the music resource supports scoring.
1: Music resources that support scoring.
2: Music resources that do not support scoring.
needHighPart: Whether chorus segment resources are needed.
YES: Chorus segment resources are needed.
NO: Chorus segment resources are not needed.

The ID of the music chart, which you can obtain from the callback. You can also use the RESTful API to [get the full song list](https://doc.shengwang.cn/doc/online-ktv/android/ktv-scenario/api/music-content-center#%E8%8E%B7%E5%8F%96%E6%9B%B2%E5%BA%93%E6%89%80%E6%9C%89%E6%AD%8C%E6%9B%B2%E5%88%97%E8%A1%A8) or [get the incremental song list](https://doc.shengwang.cn/doc/online-ktv/android/ktv-scenario/api/music-content-center#%E8%8E%B7%E5%8F%96%E5%A2%9E%E9%87%8F%E6%AD%8C%E6%9B%B2%E5%88%97%E8%A1%A8).
The current page number, starting from 1 by default.
The total number of pages for the current music resource list. The maximum value is 50.

Optional JSON field, default is null. You can use this field to filter the music resources you need. Currently supports filtering for scorable music resources and chorus segments:
pitchType: Whether the music resource supports scoring.
1: Scorable music resources.
2: Non-scorable music resources.
needHighPart: Whether chorus segment resources are needed.
YES: Chorus segment resources are needed.
NO: Chorus segment resources are not needed.

The ID of the music chart. You can obtain it from the callback. You can also use the RESTful API to [get the full music library list](https://doc.shengwang.cn/doc/online-ktv/android/ktv-scenario/api/music-content-center#%E8%8E%B7%E5%8F%96%E6%9B%B2%E5%BA%93%E6%89%80%E6%9C%89%E6%AD%8C%E6%9B%B2%E5%88%97%E8%A1%A8) or [get the incremental music list](https://doc.shengwang.cn/doc/online-ktv/android/ktv-scenario/api/music-content-center#%E8%8E%B7%E5%8F%96%E5%A2%9E%E9%87%8F%E6%AD%8C%E6%9B%B2%E5%88%97%E8%A1%A8).
Current page number, starting from 1 by default.
Total number of pages in the current music resource list. The maximum value is 50.

Extended JSON field, default is . You can use this field to filter the music resources you need. Currently supports filtering for scorable music resources and chorus segments:
pitchType: Whether the music resource supports scoring.
1: Scorable music resources.
2: Non-scorable music resources.
needHighPart: Whether chorus segment resources are needed.
YES: Chorus segment resources are needed.
NO: Chorus segment resources are not needed.
Request ID. A unique identifier for this request.

The ID of the music chart. You can obtain it from the callback. You can also use the RESTful API to [retrieve the full song list](https://doc.shengwang.cn/doc/online-ktv/android/ktv-scenario/api/music-content-center#%E8%8E%B7%E5%8F%96%E6%9B%B2%E5%BA%93%E6%89%80%E6%9C%89%E6%AD%8C%E6%9B%B2%E5%88%97%E8%A1%A8) or [retrieve the incremental song list](https://doc.shengwang.cn/doc/online-ktv/android/ktv-scenario/api/music-content-center#%E8%8E%B7%E5%8F%96%E5%A2%9E%E9%87%8F%E6%AD%8C%E6%9B%B2%E5%88%97%E8%A1%A8).
Current page number, starting from 1 by default.
Total number of pages in the current music resource list. The maximum value is 50.

Extended JSON field, default is . You can use this field to filter the music resources you need. Currently supports filtering for scoreable music resources and chorus segments:
pitchType: Whether the music resource supports scoring.
1: Scoreable music resources.
2: Non-scoreable music resources.
needHighPart: Whether chorus segment resources are needed.
YES: Chorus segment resources are needed.
NO: Chorus segment resources are not needed.

section.title: Return Values
section.p: A requestId, which uniquely identifies this request.
A requestId, which uniquely identifies this request.
A requestId, which is the unique identifier for this request.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
